description.en-US: Universal proxy toolchain for Android powered by sing-box core with support for multiple protocols[1] Features - Support for multiple proxy protocols: SOCKS (4/4a/5), HTTP(S), SSH, Shadowsocks, VMess, Trojan, VLESS, AnyTLS, ShadowTLS, TUIC, Hysteria 1/2, WireGuard[1] - Plugin support for extended protocols (Trojan-Go, Na√ØveProxy, Mieru)[1] - Multiple subscription format support (Shadowsocks, ClashMeta, v2rayN, sing-box outbound)[1] - Intuitive Android interface based on shadowsocks-android and SagerNet[1] - Built-in web dashboard powered by Yacd-meta[1] - Powered by robust sing-box core technology[1] Important Note NekoBox does not provide VPN services. Users are responsible for acquiring or setting up their own servers. Please comply with applicable laws in your jurisdiction when utilizing the app. Warning Google Play version has been controlled by third party since May 2024 and is non-open source[1]. Use only official GitHub releases.
